content: Yesterday we scheduled a breakout for demos of form renderers and builders for Friday 10:30-12, but it looks like there isn't a list yet of who would like to present. If you would like a slice of that time, could you say so here? (I can present the NLM tools, though as it worked out I already showed them to a few people earlier today.) The idea is just to get a rough count (with the expectation that we might have some last minute additions) so we have an idea of how much time we'll each have to present.
